title: Great so far
body: Coating lasted 6 months with daily use

title: Solid
body: After a year, still slick if hand-washed

title: Quick wear
body: Coating scratched after 2 weeks using a nylon spatula

title: Heats evenly
body: Heats evenly; avoided dishwasher and non-stick is fine after 8 months

title: Lightweight
body: Lightweight with comfy handle, but slight warping on induction after 4 months

title: Responsive support
body: Coating chipped at 5 months; support sent replacement that is fine after 2 months

title: Dishwasher damage
body: Ran through dishwasher twice; coating dulled and started sticking after a month

title: Long-term okay
body: Still slick after 14 months of hand-washing; no chips

title: Heavy but steady
body: Heavier base gives even heat; handle stays cool

title: Loose handle
body: Handle loosened after 5 months; needed to retighten screws
